fields.label: Mostra el botó "Enrere"
fields.description: Mostra el botó per navegar enrere a l’escena anterior

fields.label: Enable "Zoom"
fields.description: Enable zooming in and out with zoom buttons, mouse wheel, touch gestures and keyboard shortcuts.

fields.label: Títol de l’escena
fields.description: Used to identify the scene

fields.label: Descripció de l’escena
fields.description: Text que pot descriure l’escena per a l’usuari final

fields.label: Scene description (for screen readers)
fields.description: A text that can describe the scene for the end-user. It will not be visible but read by screen readers, so formatting will be ignored.

fields.label: Display "Scene Description" initially
fields.description: Display the scene description when the scene starts for the first time

fields.label: Posició inicial de la càmera
fields.description: Posició de la càmera en guinyada o capcineig

fields.label: Label
fields.description: If left blank no label will be displayed and we'll try to use the title field for screen readers

fields.label: Label position
fields.description: Choose where the label should appear

fields.label: Display Label
fields.description: If hidden - labels will show only on mouse over

fields.label: Code for the interaction
fields.description: If not empty, the user has to input the code in order to open this content. Separate multiple correct codes with /.

fields.label: A hint for the interaction code
fields.description: An optional hint for the code, can be left empty if wanted

fields.label: Show as hotspot
fields.description: Allows for adding interaction areas to the background image that can be custom size.

fields.label: Show hotspot when mouse is hovering
fields.description: Will allow hotspot to be visible when mouse is hovering the area.

fields.label: Set the hotspot be tabbable
fields.description: Will allow hotspot to be tabbable. Required to be checked to make the content accessible!

fields.label: Values for storing the height and width for hotspot
Show as open content in the scene
fields.description: Allows the content to be shown in an open dialog box directly in the scene.

fields.label: Button style
fields.description: Decide how the icon should look.

fields.label: Estil del botó
fields.description: Decidiu quin aspecte han de tenir els botons que dirigeixen a aquesta escena. Per a les escenes estàtiques que no dirigeixen a altres escenes, recomanem que s’utilitzi el botó "Més informació".

fields.label: Audio type
fields.description: Decide what audio type this scene will use, either use an audio track or choose an existing audio playlist.

fields.label: Pista d’àudio
fields.description: Afegiu una pista d’àudio que sigui específica per a aquest escenari.

fields.label: Playlist
fields.description: Here you can pick an existing playlist as audio.

fields.label: Restart audio when scene is reopened
Playlist Title
fields.description: Used to identify the playlist

fields.label: Audio Tracks
fields.description: Add audio tracks to the playlist.

semantics.label: Playlists
semantics.description: These options will let you add playlists for the scenes.

fields.label: Added playlists
fields.description: Make playlists that's available for all scenes by default.

semantics.label: Opcions de comportament
semantics.description: Aquestes opcions us permeten controlar com es comporta el món.

fields.label: Audio type
fields.description: Decide what audio type this scene will use, either use an audio track or choose an existing audio playlist.

fields.label: Àudio global
fields.description: Afegiu una pista d’àudio que estigui disponible per a totes les escenes de manera predeterminada.

fields.label: Playlist
fields.description: Here you can pick an existing playlist as audio.

fields.label: Display "Scores" button
fields.description: Display button for showing the scores from assignments.

fields.label: Display "Home" button
fields.description: Display button for going to start scene.

fields.label: Qualitat de la renderització de l’escena
fields.description: Trieu l’amplada i l’alçada que utilitzaran els segments per renderitzar una escena, ja que això influeix directament en la seva qualitat. Si una escena es veu pixelada o s’hi veuen ones, proveu d’augmentar-ne la qualitat. Tingueu en compte que les renderitzacions en alta qualitat tarden més a carregar-se.

fields.label: Label position
fields.description: The default label position. The position may be overriden per interaction

fields.label: Display Labels
fields.description: If unchecked - labels will show only on mouse over

fields.label: Label for button to reset camera
Label for the submit dialog button
Label for the close dialog button
Aria label for the expand label button
Label for when background image is loading in 360 scene
Label for when there is no content
Label for context menu button for go to scene
Label for context menu button for edit
Label for context menu button for delete
Label for button to show score summary
You are at the start scene
fields.default: You are at the start scene

fields.label: Search the room until you find the code
fields.default: Search the room until you find the code

fields.label: The code was wrong, try again.
fields.default: The code was wrong, try again.

fields.label: Drag horizontally to scale (for screen readers)
Drag vertically to scale (for screen readers)
Text for screenreaders. Title for fullscreen button (enter)
Text for screenreaders. Title for fullscreen button (exit)

Text for screenreaders. Title for zoom out button
